| History                 = An occult society of the late 19th century who perform mystical rites. They came into possession of a box containing a carnivorous insect swarm, which remained sealed up inside of [[Ambrose Carpathian (Earth-616)|Ambrose Carpathian]]'s manor until recent times, when the superhero [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] was tricked by the Space Phantom into releasing it. It was finally tossed into space by [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]].{{r|Spectacular Spider-Man Vol 1 170}}

When Ambrose's descendant [[Andrew Carpathian (Earth-616)|Andrew Carpathian]] started leading the society, he tried to retrieve the swarm but was stopped by [[Victor von Doom (Earth-616)|Doctor Doom]], [[Black Fox (Thief) (Earth-616)|Black Fox]], and Spidey.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man #350}}
